expected: After the final jump, Max finds himself in the year 1980 and he is 75 years old.
statement: In a complex time travel movie plot, Max, a 25 year old scientist, discovers a pattern in historical events that repeats every 40 years. To study this pattern, he starts in the year 2300 and travels back in increments of 40 years. He spends 5 years in each time period studying the event. After studying the event in 1900, he jumps forward 80 years to skip a cycle and lands in a new time period. In what year does he find himself after the final jump and how old is he?
